casebody.data:
EUGENE T. SHARKEY, RESPONDENT, v. COUNTY OF HUDSON, APPELLANT. Submitted January 15, 1946 Decided April 30, 1946.

Before Case, Chief Justice, and Justices Parker and Oliphant.

For the appellant, Thomas J. Armstrong (J. Emil Walscheid, on the brief). For the respondent, Eugene T. Sharkey in pro per. Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed, for the reasons stated in the full and careful opinion of Judge Roberson in the Common Pleas in the companion case of Warren v. County of Hudson, and printed in 23 N. J. Mis. R. 252.
